channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Quel est le meilleur casque à conduction osseuse en 2025 ?
item.description: Les casques à conduction osseuse délivrent le son directement via les os du crâne au lieu des tympans. Ils permettent de rester conscients de ce qui se passe autour et sont donc particulièrement conseillés aux sportifs. On fait le point sur cette technologie et sur les meilleurs modèles disponibles sur le marché !

item.title: Meet the team that investigates when journalists and activists get hacked with government spyware
item.description: For years, Access Now’s Digital Security Helpline has been aiding journalists and dissidents who have been targeted with government spyware. This is how they operate.

item.title: It’s been a special year for JRPG remakes in 2025, but these 3 games really stood out
item.description: I’ve played a ton of JRPG remakes in 2025, but these 3 are the absolute best.

item.title: Stardew Valley players on the Nintendo Switch 2 get a free upgrade
item.description: Stardew Valley is truly the gift that keeps on giving. Fans of the farm life simulator, specifically those who already own it for the Nintendo Switch 2, can download a free upgrade that introduces new features and multiplayer modes. However, fans have reported some bugs following the free release, and Eric Barone, the game's developer that's better known as ConcernedApe, is working on fixes. If you have Stardew Valley on the Switch 2, you can download the Upgrade Pack that introduces mouse controls to make it easier to place furniture and organize your inventory. The upgrade also adds local sp...

item.title: Zack Snyder Reveals Henry Cavill in the Reeves Superman Suit
item.description: Merry Kryptonmas? This was apparently the right time for Snyder to show everyone what Cavill looked like in the classic Superman costume.

item.title: Test des Harman Kardon SoundSticks 5 : le design iconique propulsé en Hi-Fi moderne, un son transparent qui réinvente le salon
item.description: La Harman Kardon SoundSticks 5 est un système audio 2.1 de salon iconique, qui mêle design transparent quasi « musée d’art moderne », éclairage d’ambiance et vraie ambition hi-fi, avec 190 W RMS, une architecture 3 voies et une connectique enfin taillée pour le téléviseur. Enceinte de salon polyvalente, à mi-chemin entre kit multimédia et mini-système home cinéma, nous l’avons testée et en voici nos impressions. ...

item.title: The biggest tech trends to expect in 2026
item.description: 2026 will be a year of big changes and developments for AI, Apple, Nvidia, robots, AR, and more. Here's what to watch.

item.title: Will we get an Apple Ring in 2026? Here's what the rumors say so far
item.description: There's been a lot of speculation about an Apple Ring in recent years – here's what we know so far.

item.title: California Might Tax Billionaires. Cue the Inevitable Tech Billionaire Tantrum
item.description: They say they're going to do something that rhymes with "grieve."

item.title: The Best After-Christmas Deals on Gear We've Tested (2025)
item.description: Money gifts burning a hole in your pocket? These deals on WIRED-tested gadgets and gizmos will stretch your dollars.
